module.name: Digium Addons
module.changelog: *2.11.0.14* FREEPBX-9055 track install status, offer instructions *2.11.0.13* Remove en_US Translations *2.11.0.12* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *2.11.0.11* Remove DL functionality as it's not supported any longer in SAPIs *2.11.0.10* FREEPBX-9093 fix regression in license form *2.11.0.9* Request from DIGIUM *2.11.0.7* FREEPBX-8990 fix XSS in digium addons *2.11.0.6* Remove old depends *2.11.0.5* Add license file *2.11.0.4* Database abstraction fixes *2.11.0.3* Check if the extension has been loaded manually. That way we don't need dl() *2.11.0.2* Prevent page crashes if dl() doesn't exist. *2.11.0.1* FreePBX/Schmoozecom Release *0.1* initial commit
